songs.title: Apology
songs.lyrics:
Verse 1:
Please turn me up
Please turn me up
I need you now
Why didn't you call?
Why didn’t you call?
After it all went down

Prechorus:
Oh, baby, I know what I did to you
(Yeah)
And I'm just glad that I ever knew you
Trust me, It's harder to live
Don’t got to look in any mirrors
I know what I did
I wish I could give you

Chorus:
A proper apology
I never got to say to you I'm sorry
I never got to say a proper apology
I never got to say to you I'm sorry
I could take it all away

Verse 2:
Oh, hey
Something was off (Something was off)
Something was wrong
That wasn't me
I let you go
When I let you go
I lost something

Prechorus:
Cause lately I been facing the truth, yeah
God, I'm just glad that I ever knew you
Trust me, It's harder to live
I know what I did

Chorus:
A proper apology
I never got to say to you I'm sorry
I never got to say a proper apology
I never got to say to you I'm sorry
I could take it all away
